description.narrative:
Project Objective: Entrepreneurs (in the Agritech sector) have registered feasible, revenue geneating start-ups, which are building innovative, easy to adopt technologies in support of the Pakistani agriculture, thus generating employment, economic independence and accelerated economic activity in Pakistan.
Project Description: This project will be a five-month virtual incubation program that supports the Pakistani Government’s vision to generate employment and focus on one of the most critical sectors of the economy. The project involves organization of extensive capacity-building workshops for twenty start-ups (inducting forty entrepreneurs) , one-on-one mentorship sessions to counsel entrepreneurs for low-cost, easy to adopt products/services and the facilitation of access for entrepreneurs to necessary resources, technical know-how, industry-networks, and a platform to pitch their ideas to renowned venture capitalists.
